bio: Here for the community and future of Web3
contributionDescription:
More for communication stuff than technical details. Willing to help OPTIMISM to grow and become a standard in the Web3 space. 
Want to use RetroPGF first for governance, but try to work on other things. Maybe I can help on projects and be active on Discord.
impactDescription:
Hope to fill more in future. Let me start an learning the Optimism ecosystem.

These two things I will try to support: 

User acceptance: The success of Optimism also depends on user acceptance. DApps and users must be willing to use Layer-2 solutions and rely on them. This often requires seamless integration and a user-friendly interface.

Ethereum integration: Integration with the Ethereum blockchain is of great importance. Optimism aims to be compatible with Ethereum, but it is important that the two interact well and work together smoothly.
pwFlaggedReason: Flagged: The application contains false and irrelevant links for both the contribution and the impact metrics, which goes against the rule about spam.
pwCategorySuggestions: Layer 2 Scaling, User Experience & Adoption, Smart Contract Platforms
